name: era-chinese-documentation
description: 做便捷至极的 Emuera + Eramaker + Erabasic 文档。
author: Miswanting <ihex@foxmail.com>

scripts.docs:build: node scripts/prelude.js && pnpm vuepress build docs
scripts.docs:clean: pnpm rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml node_modules docs/.vuepress/.temp docs/.vuepress/.cache docs/.vuepress/dist
scripts.docs:dev: node scripts/prelude.js && pnpm vuepress dev docs
scripts.docs:serve: node scripts/prelude.js && pnpm vitepress serve docs
